channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [FLINK-22547] OperatorCoordinatorHolderTest. verifyCheckpointEventOrderWhenCheckpointFutureCompletesLate fail

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
I found the problem, it is a test instability (thread race in test setup).
Will open a PR to make this robust...

Fixed in

  • master (1.14.0) via 2c1284bfe272f33e9a98a3ea41a6ed37292eef65
  • release-1.13 (1.13.3) via 950ea33cb6ec5716ff26750eddf8a7bd4b869d0e
  • release-1.12 (1.12.5) via 8f0e13ced6ee64e796f68c8d470de94e7ab9e47d
